security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document is a notification from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding the postponed release of certain information, specifically Social Security numbers, from HSCA staff payroll records, citing unwarranted invasion of personal privacy.
summary_one_paragraph: The Assassination Records Review Board issued a final determination in December 1995 regarding HSCA staff payroll records (Record Number 180-10068-10352), deciding to postpone in part the release of information. The postponement concerns Social Security numbers, citing that public disclosure would constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy that outweighs public interest; these redactions are noted as 'SSN' with the next review scheduled for 2017.
title: Final Determination Notification - HSCA Staff Payroll Records
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives
